#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

void _answer()
{
	string a, b;
	cin >> a >> b;
	sort(a.begin(), a.end());
	sort(b.begin(), b.end());
	if(a.compare(b) == 0)
		cout << "YES\n";
	else
		cout << "NO\n";
}

int main()
{
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false); cin.tie(NULL);
    #ifdef LOCAL
      freopen("sample_input.txt","r",stdin);
    #endif
	size_t _t;
	cin >> _t;
    cin.ignore();
	while (_t--){
		_answer();
	}
    return 0;
}
